title: We, in the Time of Corona

episodes.content: Takaharu and Yui Tezuka are architects who focus on human connection, sometimes literally removing walls between us in a bid to change lives and society itself. Explore new lifestyles for a new era.
episodes.description: Takaharu and Yui Tezuka are architects who focus on human connection, sometimes literally removing walls between us in a bid to change lives and society itself. Explore new lifestyles for a new era.
episodes.subtitle: Takaharu & Yui Tezuka, Architects
episodes.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episodes.content: Shigeyama Sengoro, a Kyogen comic actor, believes people need relaxing laughter to get through this crisis. He is exploring streamed performances to perpetuate the 650-year-old performing art.
episodes.description: Shigeyama Sengoro, a Kyogen comic actor, believes people need relaxing laughter to get through this crisis. He is exploring streamed performances to perpetuate the 650-year-old performing art.
episodes.subtitle: Shigeyama Sengoro XIV, Kyogen Actor
episodes.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episodes.content: Blanche Wiesen Cook is a historian and an author of bestselling biography on Eleanor Roosevelt. Cook keeps educating people to achieve dignity for all by learning from history.
episodes.description: Blanche Wiesen Cook is a historian and an author of bestselling biography on Eleanor Roosevelt. Cook keeps educating people to achieve dignity for all by learning from history.
episodes.subtitle: Blanche Wiesen Cook, Author, Historian, Educator
episodes.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episodes.content: Yoshua Bengio, a global frontrunner in AI research and a recipient of the Turing Award in 2019, talks about how AI can be used to fight the pandemic.
episodes.description: Yoshua Bengio, a global frontrunner in AI research and a recipient of the Turing Award in 2019, talks about how AI can be used to fight the pandemic.
episodes.subtitle: Yoshua Bengio, Computer Scientist
episodes.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episodes.content: For former astronaut Chris Hadfield, life in self-isolation amid a pandemic is similar to that of an astronaut in space. We asked how he is coping with sequestering during this pandemic.
episodes.description: For former astronaut Chris Hadfield, life in self-isolation amid a pandemic is similar to that of an astronaut in space. We asked how he is coping with sequestering during this pandemic.
episodes.subtitle: Chris Hadfield, Former Astronaut
episodes.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episodes.content: Successive headmasters of Kyoto's oldest ikebana school honor the spirit of imbuing life into the flowers they arrange. Senko Ikenobo discusses the importance and universality of living with nature.
episodes.description: Successive headmasters of Kyoto's oldest ikebana school honor the spirit of imbuing life into the flowers they arrange. Senko Ikenobo discusses the importance and universality of living with nature.
episodes.subtitle: Senko Ikenobo, Headmaster Designate of Ikenobo Ikebana, Buddhist Monk
episodes.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episodes.content: Osaka University professor Hiroshi Ishiguro, who leads the field of humanlike robots, discusses how living in harmony with remote-controlled robots and avatars in the near future will change society.
episodes.description: Osaka University professor Hiroshi Ishiguro, who leads the field of humanlike robots, discusses how living in harmony with remote-controlled robots and avatars in the near future will change society.
episodes.subtitle: Hiroshi Ishiguro, Roboticist
episodes.title: We, in the Time of Corona
